titles.title: To provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of imported chemicals.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1370)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 6/29/1994--Introduced. Directs the U.S. Customs Service, upon proper request, to: (1) reliquidate certain entries of imported chemicals at a rate of duty of 3.7 percent ad valorem; and (2) refund to the importer the appropriate amount of duty paid with respect to such entries.
